Description:
As a Service Manager, you will be responsible for the efficient and effective management of our service department, specifically focusing on Chinese electric vehicles. Your key responsibilities will include:Manage and lead a team of skilled technicians and service advisors.
Oversee the timely maintenance and repair of Chinese electric vehicles, ensuring high service quality.
Uphold our commitment to exceptional customer service, addressing inquiries and resolving issues.
Collaborate closely with other departments to optimize overall dealership operations.
Develop and implement service procedures and policies to improve efficiency and customer satisfaction.
Monitor and manage service department performance, including key performance indicators (KPIs) and financial goals.
Stay up to date with the latest developments in electric vehicle technology and ensure the team is trained accordingly.
Handle escalated customer concerns and ensure their swift resolution.
Maintain a safe and compliant working environment, adhering to all safety regulations.
Foster a positive and motivated team culture, encouraging continuous learning and development.
Prepare reports on service department activities and present findings to senior management.
Manage inventory and parts ordering to ensure timely repairs and maintenance.
Work closely with the sales team to ensure a seamless customer experience from purchase to service.
Lead service department meetings and provide regular feedback and coaching to team members.Skills
Skills:
Proven experience in automotive service management with a successful track record.
Strong understanding of electric vehicle technology, including charging systems, batteries, and diagnostics.
Exceptional leadership and interpersonal skills to motivate and guide the team effectively.
Passion for delivering outstanding customer service and maintaining long-term customer relationships.
Adaptability to thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic automotive environment.
